snippet.title: Sega Saturn: Minton Keibu no Sousa file -Doukeshi Satsujin Jiken
snippet.description: Obscure adventure game from Riverhillsoft. In this game you play inspector Minton, trying to solve the town's various mysteries by talking to people and looking for clues.
